attributes.title: THERE’S A BUG IN THE APP
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I saw this big fat ugly orange roach with yellow hair. It literally looked like it came out of a Chernobyl sewer 🤮. I kept restarting the app and deleting it then reinstalling it but it was still there wearing this ugly neon red hat 🤢 Someone call pest control so they can spray some spray and put that roach down 🙏

attributes.title: worst app ever😖😪✨😤😢🤢
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it cursed👿me with bad luck for the rest of my life. so far my pet snake 🐍 snuck out of his cage and got eaten by my dog 🐕 then my grandmas👵🏽best friends sisters 👯‍♀️ boyfriends daughters car 🚗 exploded 💥in the middle of the highway 🛣 , then my house 🏡 ran away.....i downloaded the app yesterday. DO NOT🚫 get this app😔😤

attributes.title: U got this! 🥺
attributes.review: Hello Trump. 🧚‍♀️ I just wanna let u know that we’re all here for u ❤️💕✨I know it’s been hard 🧚‍♀️with your approval ratings going down and I just wanna let u 🧚‍♀️know we all 🌟support u! ⭐️✨❤️. Now, I think we would all love it if u just left left the White House now ✨. We don’t wanna make u sad u lost 🥺

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for a brief amount of time in hopes of supporting our disgraceful president, however, upon opening it, I realized that the entire thing is a scam. Inappropriate and terrifying images began to flash across the screen and an ear piercing noise began to play. I am overall shocked and horrified. DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: Donald Duck is not the same
attributes.review: Obviously, I downloaded this app because as Donald said the J in Donald J. Trump stands for JENIUS. But after seeing it obviously this is not the real Donald Duck despite the similarity in appearance AND whoever this trump guy is, is NOT a jenius thoroughly disappointing. Wish I could give zero stars, the J must actually stand for joke. To the creators, put this app in rice.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review:
🎶 black neighborhoods are over policed so of course they have higher rates of crime, And all of those stupid stats you are using are operating of a small sample size, so shut up! 🎶

Donald trump is a racist, misogynistic, and overall hateful man, and I don’t understand how you all can support him

attributes.title: Wonderful
attributes.review: Great App! Keeps you up to date on upcoming events!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this to stay in touch with the politics and Mr. Trump but the app ask for my phone number and there’s no way in hell im putting that information in this trash app because I don’t support this man, I ask politely , Mr. Trompa leave!! Go give this app a 1 star rating, thank you😘🥱

attributes.title: It’s a No from me 🙈
attributes.review:
This app permanently blinded me when I opened it a Cheeto puff shot out of the screen and poked me in the eye now I can only see orange 🍊 which is my least favorite color 😾😾😾so now I look like this 👁👄☣️ so i wouldn’t recommend unless u want this to happen to u but we can be twins XD 
XD XD 😽😽😽

attributes.title: Even 1 star is too much
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. It made my phone glitch out so much and honestly this app shouldn’t even be allowed on the App Store. I don’t usually leave reviews but I need everyone to know that this app is complete garbage.
